connectionToPtLawrence: Mrs. Hilbert was inspiration for Point Lawrence Lodge. The Hilberts invested in and helped build the Point Lawrence Lodge. They hired Jean (Rothenhoefer) Culver for two summers - which is how Jean met Carroll Culver.
biography: Mrs. Hilbert was inspiration for Point Lawrence Lodge. They invested, helped build the Point Lawrence Lodge. They hired Jean (Rothenhoefer) Culver for two summers.
miscellaneous: Key figure in Point Lawrence Lodge history. Connection to how Jean Rothenhoefer met Carroll Culver.
researchQuestions: What were the Hilberts' first names?
What was their relationship to the Culver family?
When did they invest in Point Lawrence Lodge?
What was their role in building the Lodge?
notes: Stub page - placeholder for research. Key figures in Lodge history.
